titleStmt.title: The sayings of women, which were spoken upon sundry occasions, in several places of the Scriptures. / Briefly collected and set together ...
titleStmt.author: Bathurst, Elizabeth, d. 1691.

titleStmt.title: The sayings of women, which were spoken upon sundry occasions, in several places of the Scriptures. / Briefly collected and set together ...
titleStmt.author: Bathurst, Elizabeth, d. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle at the Crooked-Billet in Holloway-Lane in Shoreditch,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).

With: Truth vindicated. / By ... Elizabeth Bathurst ... [London] : Printed for T. Sowles ..., 1691 -- Truth's vindication, A gentle stroke to wipe off the foul aspersions, false accusations and misrepresentations cast upon the people of God call'd Quakers. London : Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ..., 1683.
